name: #SELFIE
content: When Jason was at the table
I kept on seeing him look at me
我注意到他一直在看我
When he was with that other girl
当他和其他的女孩在一起
Do you think he was just doing that
你觉得这是否只是逢场作戏
Because he was totally texting me
因为他一直给我发信息
我不知道这是否只是想约我
So like what do you think
那么举个例子你觉得呢
Did you think that girl was pretty
你觉得那个女孩漂亮吗
How did that girl even get in here
那个女孩怎么混进来的
Why does the DJ keep on
After we go to the bathroom
等我们去洗手间的时候
Can we go smoke a cigarette
Can you guys help me pick a filter
伙计你能帮我挑个滤镜吗
I don't know if I should go
是用XX Pro还是Valencia修图比较好
我想要我的皮肤是棕褐色
在照片上应该加什么字呢
I want it to be clever
我希望它看起来比较新颖
How about livin' with my bitches
加上一行和姐妹们一起玩乐
发了五分钟才只有十个赞
Do you think I should take it down
你觉得我是不是应该删了它
Wait pause Jason just liked my selfie
等一下杰森刚才点赞了
Is that guy sleeping over there
躺在那边睡觉的人不会是他吧
Yeah the one next to the girl
That girl is such a fake model
那个女孩一看就整容了
OK let's go take some shots
不行了我觉得我要吐了
Oh wait never mind I'm fine
等一下别介意啊我没事了
There's no vodka at this table
桌子上没有伏特加酒了
Do you know anyone else here
你在这里还认识别人吗
Oh my God Jason just texted me
Should I go home with him
我是否应该和他一起回家
I guess I took a good selfie
